title: Oakland Tribune Magazine

renewed-contributions.title: The Running Noose and its Use in Forty-Nine
Lippy Luxe, the Lonesome Liar of Likker Gulch. 2d Portion, A Turrible Imagination and a Gold-Plated Man

additional-note: Published as a special section of the Oakland Tribune. Some of the renewals recorded for contributions to the Oakland Tribune might have been for pieces that appeared in the Magazine.
